DOC.brief_summary: The study was designed to employ MOCA to screen mild cognitive impairment (MCI) in military retirees and to analyze the associated risk factors. As such, MOCA was revised to be validated for the Chinese context.
DOC.brief_title: Application and Revision of Montreal Cognitive Assessment in Chinese Retirees
DOC.detailed_description: Three hundred and four retired military cadres were investigated using a random cluster sampling technique including personal information, prevalence, MOCA scale, and related neuropsychiatry scale. Thirty retirees were random chosen and tested again with the revised MOCA scale one month later.
DOC.criteria: aged >=60 years old retired military cadres lived in Xian,Shaanxi,China questionnaires completed deafmute
